extension.title: LinkedIn Extension
extension.label: LinkedIn
extension.description: This extension contains functions for embedding LinkedIn widgets.

function.name: CompanyInsider
function.description: Embed widget to show connections at a company.
function.param: Style for embedding widget. (one of "popup", "border", or "noborder"; default: "popup")

function.name: Share
function.description: Embed link to share a page with others on LinkedIn.
function.param: Name of origin site where the page comes from. (default: none)
Label for link to share on LinkedIn. (default: 'Share on LinkedIn')

body.eval:expr: web.link(uri.appendquery('http://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle', { mini: 'true', url: $uri, title: $title, source: $origin, summary: $summary }), $label ?? 'Share on LinkedIn')
